articles.author: Steve Kopack
articles.title: Larry Ellison eclipses Elon Musk as world's richest person - NBC News
articles.description: Oracle's Larry Ellison became the richest person in the world Wednesday morning, with shares of the tech giant he co-founded surging more than 40%
articles.content:
Oracle's Larry Ellison became the richest person in the world Wednesday morning, with shares of the tech giant he co-founded surging more than 40%.
As of 10 a.m. ET, Ellison's wealth was nearly $400… [+1617 chars]
